attributes.action: Give Palestinians The Freedom Of Their Land Back
attributes.additional_details:
Dear People Of The World,

Since 1948, the slaughtering of Innocent Palestinian Civilians By The Zionist State Of Israel, however Britain and America still protect their interests and supply them with weapons to kill the innocent just to achieve a goal of acquiring more land, with Israel using chemical weapons and just plainly killing just for the sake of it. The laws they have broken within the international court expands so far but yet they brush it under the carpet.

We need to see change in this world where we can live in peace no matter what religion or race or creed you are!

The killing of innocent civilians and Israel allies just agreeing that they are protecting themselves, just explain how innocent civilians are a threat.

Sign sign sign sign sign this has gone on too far and the British government need to realise this!
